name: brickslopes
description: The website for BrickSlopes, A LEGO Fan Event

scripts.postinstall: curl http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.0.min.js > ./app/lib/jquery.min.js; curl https://code.angularjs.org/1.2.9/angular.min.js > ./app/lib/angular.min.js; curl https://code.angularjs.org/1.2.9/angular-route.min.js > ./app/lib/angular-route.min.js; curl http://getcomposer.org/composer.phar > composer.phar; php composer.phar install; gem install oily_png;
